title: Parted Light
description: Angels and Demons battle it out in this first book of the series. Follow along with Eugene as he trains new Guardian Angels. Follow him as he helps them find their kinsouls, and teaches them how to will them to do their bidding. Meet up with Moses and Noah for some old-school wisdom, and witness Joshua take the fight to his eternal enemies, Demons. A must-read for all ages.
author: Christian Cavendish
